summary: CBS, short for Columbia Broadcasting System, is an American TV and radio network. It's part of Paramount Global, along with Paramount Pictures and MTV. Based in New York City, CBS is one of the "Big Three" TV networks. It's also known as the Eye Network because its logo is an eye, and as the Tiffany Network for its high-quality programming and early color TV demonstrations. CBS has major facilities in New York and Los Angeles.
title: CBS
